title: How to prove that I am a time traveller - Quora

response.answer_text: Q: How do I prove that I am a time traveller? You could start with taking well known people to the past or future and bringing them back with souvenirs, in front of an audience. I’m sure the people you take would be amazed and not stop telling others about what happened. Second, you could learn about events of the upcoming year and then tell us about them before they happen. Maybe find events that are impossible for humans to alter, like volcano eruptions, earthquakes, tornadoes, snow storms, etc. and spell out the exact place and time they will occur.

It’s quite simple. Since you’re from the future you know what happens before it takes place. Start making and publishing detailed predictions. When you’re proven to be right thousands of times, people will begin to take your far-fetched claims seriously! But since you’re from the future I’m sure you would already know this.

If you truly are a time traveller then you will have no problem convincing conspiricists, however no amount of proof will make a sceptic believe you. I would suggest bringing a piece of technology from your time, and showing it to those who you wish to convince. I hope this helps.
Play lottery, if you do not win, you are not a time traveler
